pallekale kridanganaye pawathi mahanuwara dharmaraja - kingswud maha krikat tharagaya narambaimata yana bawa pawasamin mithuran pirisak samanga haloluwa warathanna sima malakaya asalin mahawali gange diya namata giya mahanuwara dharmaraja widyalaye dahath hawiridi sisuwaku pasugiya 17da diye gili miyagos atha.miyagos aththe mahanuwara kirthi shri rajasinha mawathe padinchi mudalige dilanga namathi sisuweki.miyagiya sisuwa dharmaraja - kinswud maha krikat tharagaya narambaa pasuwa pasal mithuran siwudenaku samanga mahawali gange diyanamata gos sitiyadi diye gili athi athara thalathuoya nawika hamuda kandawure niladharin pirisak wisin mala sirura pereda (18da) soyaganu labiya.meki sisuwa mewara a.po.sa. samanya pela wibhagayata peni sita prathipala apekshawen sitina ayaku bawath ohu dharmaraja widyalayiya papandu kandayameda samajikayaku bawath polisiya pawasayi.
